name: Golf Gambler
description: The Golf Gambler iOS App allows you to conveniently score, track and calculate the player winnings and simplified payouts across multiple golf wagering games (Skins, Wolf, Nassau, Match Play, etc). The App allows you to setup as many wagering games as you like, simply name the game and select the wagering type. During the golf round, score the action as it happens for each player.  When the golf round is complete, just go to the Results screen to reveal the Simplified Payout already calculated.  You can then easily email the detailed results and simplified payout to all of the participants.
